name: Blaynix
description:
敵は出現から短時間で倒すほどスコアが高く、近距離で倒すほど多くのボーナスアイテムを放出します。
ゲージをチャージする事で使用可能になるオーバードライブを使用する事で更に高得点を狙う事ができます。(最大256倍)

全5面。コンティニュー有。

Enemies will give more points the sooner they're killed after appearing on screen, and defeating enemies in close proximity will cause them to drop more bonus items.

You can push your scores to even further heights by going into Overdrive, which can be activated when the gauge is completely charged (maximum x256 multiplier).

The game features a total of five stages, as well as a continue function.
